          <title>
            <string language="sl">Čudovite rastline - različne naloge</string>
            <string language="en">Amazing plants - different exercises</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Erstaunliche Betriebe - unterschiedliche Übungen</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Usines étonnantes - différents exercices</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Plantas surpreendentes - exercícios diferentes</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Piante stupefacenti - esercitazioni differenti</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Καταπληκτικές εγκαταστάσεις - διαφορετικές ασκήσεις</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Plantas asombrosas - diversos ejercicios</string>
          </title>
          <language>sl</language>
          <description>
            <string language="sl">Za učence, ki imajo probleme z branjem. Različne naloge spodbujajo uspešno branje.</string>
            <string language="en">Collection of different exercises (word search puzzle, anagrams, ...) about exotic plants to exercise reading comprehension.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">rastlina</string>
            <string language="en">plant</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">uganka</string>
            <string language="en">riddle</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">osmica</string>
            <string language="en">word search puzzle</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">anagram</string>
            <string language="en">anagram</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">eksotika</string>
            <string language="en">exotic</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Ansammlung unterschiedliche Übungen 
(Wortsuchpuzzlespiel, -anagramme...) über die exotischen Betriebe, 
zum des Leseerfassens auszuüben.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Collection de différents exercices (puzzle, 
anagrammes de recherche de mot...) au sujet des usines exotiques pour 
exercer la compréhension de lecture.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Coleção de exercícios diferentes (enigma, 
anagrams da busca da palavra...) sobre as plantas exotic para 
exercitar a compreensão da leitura.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Accumulazione delle esercitazioni differenti 
(puzzle, anagrams di ricerca di parola...) circa le piante esotiche 
per esercitare comprensione della lettura.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Συλλογή των διαφορετικών ασκήσεων (γρίφος αναζήτησης 
λέξης, αναγράμματα...) για τις εξωτικές εγκαταστάσεις για να 
ασκήσει την κατανόηση ανάγνωσης.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Colección de diversos ejercicios (rompecabezas, 
anagrams de la búsqueda de la palabra...) sobre las plantas exóticas
para ejercitar la comprensión de la lectura.</string>
          </description>
